a.description:
sudo ubos-admin createsite
   Specify * as the site, $app as the app, and fill out the rest of the questions
a.raw_description:
sudo ubos-admin createsite
   Specify * as the site, $app as the app, and fill out the rest of the questions

o.description: UBOS thinks for a while, prints a URL (note as URL) and returns to shell prompt
o.raw_description: UBOS thinks for a while, prints a URL (note as URL) and returns to shell prompt

o.description: prints out the site you just created
o.raw_description: prints out the site you just created

a.description: With a web browser, visit URL
a.raw_description: With a web browser, visit URL

o.description: The app's front page comes up
o.raw_description: The app's front page comes up

a.description: Log into the app with admin/admin
a.raw_description: Log into the app with admin/admin

o.description: UBOS thinks for a while, returns to shell prompt
o.raw_description: UBOS thinks for a while, returns to shell prompt

o.description: the site is not printed any more
o.raw_description: the site is not printed any more
